text:
staging system for cancer of the sphenoid and frontal sinuses.
                    
                
                
                    The following stages are used for maxillary sinus cancer:
                    Stage 0 (Carcinoma in Situ)    In stage 0, abnormal cells are found in the innermost lining of the maxillary sinus. These abnormal cells may become cancer and spread into nearby normal tissue. Stage 0 is also called carcinoma in situ.       Stage I     In stage I, cancer has formed
